Articles.Content:
Ahh... so it is like Infernal Robotics after all. Well, thanks for testing anyway.

No worries. It's such a potentially awesomely cool feature that soon as I heard about it being in stock my eyes went wide and I dove right in there

I had a lot of fun in testing it anyways, so really wasn't any kind of sacrifice on my part to do so. Here's hoping Squad comes back to this one again in the near future, as it really blows the lid right off on player creativity, in ways that I can't remember any other feature in recent memory doing.
